supportedPatterns.example: create a circle that is blue

fallbackTemplates.simpleShape: function setup() { createCanvas(800, 600); } function draw() { background(240); fill(100); ellipse(400, 300, 100, 100); }
fallbackTemplates.coloredShape: function setup() { createCanvas(800, 600); } function draw() { background(240); fill({r}, {g}, {b}); {shape}({x}, {y}, {size}); }
fallbackTemplates.animatedShape: function setup() { createCanvas(800, 600); } function draw() { background(240); fill({r}, {g}, {b}); push(); translate(400, 300); rotate(frameCount * {speed}); {shape}(0, 0, {size}); pop(); }
